Solar_Panel.name: Solar Panel
Solar_Panel.description: Captures solar energy to power the system.

embodiment.description: Standard polycrystalline silicon cells for cost-effectiveness.

physics_models.name: Power Generation
physics_models.coding_directives: Calculate power output based on solar irradiance.
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_power(efficiency, area, solar_irradiance):
    return efficiency * area * solar_irradiance
physics_models.coder_notes: This model calculates the power output from the solar panel.
assumptions: Solar irradiance varies between 300 W/m² and 1000 W/m².

physics_models.name: Battery
physics_models.coding_directives: Calculate battery capacity based on power and time.
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_capacity(power, time):
    return power * time
physics_models.coder_notes: This model calculates the battery capacity required.

Solar_Panel.verification_plan: Test under varying solar conditions to ensure power output meets requirements.

Filter_Unit.name: Filter Unit

embodiment.description: Low-cost ceramic elements for basic filtration.

physics_models.name: Flow Rate
physics_models.coding_directives: Calculate flow rate based on volume and time.
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_flow_rate(volume, time):
    return volume / time
physics_models.coder_notes: This model calculates the flow rate of the filter.
assumptions: Volume is measured in liters and time in hours.

Filter_Unit.verification_plan: Test flow rate and contaminant removal efficiency.

Battery.name: Battery
Battery.description: Stores energy for operation during low light conditions.

embodiment.description: Cost-effective lead-acid battery for energy storage.

physics_models.name: Energy Storage
physics_models.coding_directives: Calculate stored energy based on capacity and voltage.
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_energy(capacity, voltage):
    return capacity * voltage
physics_models.coder_notes: This model calculates the energy stored in the battery.

Battery.verification_plan: Test battery capacity and discharge rate.

Control_Unit.name: Control Unit
Control_Unit.description: Manages system operations and user interface.

embodiment.description: Basic microcontroller for system control and monitoring.

physics_models.name: Processing Power
physics_models.coding_directives: Calculate processing time based on instructions and processing power.
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_processing_time(instructions, processing_power):
    return instructions / processing_power
physics_models.coder_notes: This model calculates the processing time for the control unit.
assumptions: Instructions are measured in million instructions per second (MIPS).

Control_Unit.verification_plan: Test user interface responsiveness and control functions.

Water_Tank.name: Water Tank

embodiment.description: Durable plastic tank for water storage.

physics_models.name: Storage Capacity
physics_models.coding_directives: Calculate storage capacity based on tank size.
physics_models.coder_notes: This model calculates the storage capacity of the water tank.

Water_Tank.verification_plan: Test water storage capacity and integrity.
